::KitKat::

She felt weak in the knees all of a sudden. "Oh. I....ah.."  She sat 
down and felt extrememly dizzy. " I don't know what to say."  She 
loked at him as tears welled up in her eyes.

This was a lot to have happen at once. First, she had to deal with 
the organization of what was left of her group. But a proposal was 
something she never expected.

She sat down and watched the room spin. "I...I.." her throat felt dry 
and she could hardly talk.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Hmmm. Work, or this? Thats a tuffy.", he said, sarcasticly.
> He began kissing her neck, and feeling her up.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He walked up behind her. 
> "Yes. And it's not your fault, its Megatron's. Oh, and I need to get
> this off my chest." He came in front of her, droped to one knee, and
> took her hand.
> He searched for the words, but could only come up with the human 
ones.
> They would do.
> "Will you... marry me?"
